channel.title: rust on nerv
channel.description: Recent content in rust on nerv

item.title: Notes on Rust For Rustaceans
item.description: Intro I’m really enjoying reading Jon Gjenset’s Rust for Rustaceans. I appreciated the author’s decision to assume his target audience to be people who had just finished The Book, making it sort of an expansion or a Level II. However, I found it light on contrasting examples, as well as images. I’m more of a visual learner, so I find them very useful to understand what’s right (or wrong), or to help me create a mental model of a concept being described.
